name: VayyarCareFallDetection
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Vayyar Care is a unique touchless fall detection system. Just place it on the wall, and if there’s a fall it will get help. Each wall-mounted device monitors a room 24/7 in all conditions: in complete darkness and even dense steam. There are no buttons, no cords, no wearables, and no cameras, so privacy is maintained at all times.

If Vayyar Care detects a fall, Alexa will connect from the nearest Alexa-enabled device to the Alexa Together Urgent Response emergency helpline. Alexa will also notify a designated caregiver, ensuring their loved one gets the help they need.

Each Vayyar Care device provides wide room coverage of up to 13 feet x 13 feet. You can install single or multiple devices in your bedrooms, bathrooms, kitchen, or living spaces, ensuring round-the-clock protection. Please note that stairwells are not supported at this time.

To get started:
1. Register for Alexa Together.
2. Download the Vayyar Care app.
3. Follow the setup instructions in the Vayyar Care app.
4. Return to the Alexa app.
5. Complete the Vayyar Care and Alexa account linking.
